title: City sailors
creator_credit: Jack Rogers, R. Maslyn Williams and Australian news and Information Bureau
brief_description: Shows Sydney Harbour with its wide scope for sailing, the innumerable bays and inlets which provide safe mooring and the warm sunlit days which have made sailing a popular summer pastime. Commentator: James Dibble.
